info.title: BioT Facade
info.description: APIs document description for facade service

post.description: Self sign up for patients This API is used by a patient to sign up. The patient will be created with the provided information. If registration code is provided - the patient will be assigned to the device linked to the provided registration code. The Registration code must exist and be linked to a device. That device should not be assigned to any patient, and be in the same organization as the patient or in the manufacturer's organization. (*)This parameter is mandatory only if its optional parent attribute is defined. Click here for more information. Request Body Parameters: | Parameter |Type | Mandatory| Description | Example | |-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------| |_name|object|true||| |_name.firstName|string|true(*)|A person's first name|John| |_name.lastName|string|true(*)|A person's last name|Smith| |_description|string|false|A description, can be up to 5000 characters long|Lorem Ipsum| |_email|string|true|An email address in the RFC-5322 specification|john.smith@biot-med.com| |_phone|string|false|A person's phone An E.164 formatted phone number|+12345678901| |_locale|string|false|A person's locale Locale in the following format: {language-ISO639}-{countryCode-ISO3166} lowercase.|en-us| |_gender|string|false|A persons gender Values:MALE,FEMALE,UNDISCLOSED|FEMALE| |_dateOfBirth|string|false|A person's date of birth A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format|Thu Dec 20 00:00:00 UTC 2007| |_address|object|false||| |_address.countryCode|string|true(*)|A 2-letter country code defined in ISO-3166|US| |_address.state|string|false|A state|Massachusetts| |_address.city|string|false|A city|Boston| |_address.zipCode|string|false|A zipcode|02101| |_address.address1|string|false|An address|11 Main St.| |_address.address2|string|false|An address's specifics|Entry B, Apartment 1| |_mfa|object|false||| |_mfa.enabled|boolean|true(*)|MFA login enabled or disabled|| |_mfa.expirationInMinutes|integer|false|MFA expiration time in minutes|| |_additionalPhone|string|false|An E.164 formatted phone number|+12345678901| |_nationalId|string|false|A person's national ID|123456789| |_username|string|true|User's username. Can be an email or a regular username. With this username you login to the system.|john@biotmail.com or john123| |_password|string|true|A password|Aa123456| |_deviceRegistrationCode|string|false|The registration code entity that is attached to the device|RegistrationCode123| |_ownerOrganization|object|true||| |_ownerOrganization.id|string|true(*)|A UUID formatted string|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6| |_caregiver|object|false||| |_caregiver.id|string|true(*)|A UUID formatted string|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6| This API is **public**.

201.description:
The below table describes the response parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   |Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|---------------------|-----------|
|device|object|||
|device._description|string|Device description||
|device._timezone|string|A java time zone supported by the java runtime environment|Europe/Oslo|
|device._id|string|The id of the device||
|device._ownerOrganization|object|||
|device._ownerOrganization.id|string|A UUID formatted string|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6|
|device._ownerOrganization.templateId|string|The id of a template that is configured in the settings service.|3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6|
|device._ownerOrganization.parentEntityId|string|The id of the parent entity (appears only for child entities)||
|device._ownerOrganization.templateName|string|The name of the referenced entity template||
|device._ownerOrganization.name|string|The caption of the referenced entity||
|device._template|object|||
|device._template.name|string|The name of the template||
|device._template.displayName|string|The display name of the template||
|device._template.parentTemplate|object|||
|device._template.parentTemplate.id|string|||
|device._template.parentTemplate.displayName|string|||
|device._template.parentTemplate.name|string|||
|device._template.id|string|The id of the template||
|device._referencers|object|An object that contains all the referencers of this entity. Each referencer is the RSAN and it's an object that contains the count of the referrers, and information of the referrer (in case count = 1)||
|device._configuration|object|An object that holds the entity configuration attributes||
|device._status|object|||
|device._status._fwVersion|string|||
|device._status._hwVersion|string|||
|device._status._certificateStatus|string| Values:NOT_INSTALLED,BOOTSTRAP,PERMANENT||
|device._status._bootTime|string|A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format||
|device._status._connection|object|||
|device._status._connection._connected|boolean|If the device is connected to the MQTT the value is true, otherwise false|true|
|device._status._connection._ipAddress|string|The IP Address of the connected device|2007-12-20|
|device._status._connection._lastConnectedTime|string|The last time that the device was connected||
|device._status._operational|object|||
|device._status._operational._status|string|Operational status of the device Values:OK,MINOR,MAJOR,CRITICAL||
|device._status._operational._message|string|Operational status message||
|device._patient|object|||

|device._lastModifiedTime|string|A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format|2007-12-20T10:15:30Z|
|device._caption|string|The caption of the command instance|mydevice1|

post.summary: Anonymous self sign up for patients
post.description:
Anonymous self sign up for patients



This API is used by a patient to anonymously sign up. The patient will be created with the provided information.
The patient will be assigned to the device linked to the provided registration code.
The Registration code must exist and be linked to a device.
That device should not be assigned to any patient, and be in the manufacturer's organization.


Request Body Parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   | Mandatory| Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------|
|_username|string|true|User's username. Can be an email or a regular username. With this username you login to the system.|john@biotmail.com or john123|
|_password|string|true|A password|Aa123456|
|_nickname|string|false|The nickname of the user|Nicky123|
|_deviceRegistrationCode|string|true|The registration code entity that is attached to the device|RegistrationCode123|


This API is **public**.

post.summary: Assign a device to a patient
post.description:
Assign a device to a patient



The patient from the token will be assigned to the device linked to the provided registration code.
The Registration code must exist and be linked to a device.
That device should either not be assigned to any patient or already assigned to this patient, and either be in the same organization as the patient or be in the manufacturer's organization.


Request Body Parameters:

| Parameter   |Type   | Mandatory| Description          | Example   |
|-------------|-------|----------|----------------------|-----------|
|deviceRegistrationCode|string|true|The registration code entity that is attached to the device|RegistrationCode123|


This API requires **PROTECTED_API** permission(s).

200.description:
The below table describes the response parameters:

|_ownerOrganization.templateName|string|The name of the referenced entity template||
|_ownerOrganization.name|string|The caption of the referenced entity||
|_template|object|||
|_template.name|string|The name of the template||
|_template.displayName|string|The display name of the template||
|_template.parentTemplate|object|||

|_configuration|object|An object that holds the entity configuration attributes||

500.description:
Code : FACADE_ROLLBACK_FAILED, Details: []

Code : INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR, Details: []

get.description:
Service Health check API

The API returns 200 if the service is up, used by the Load Balancer

This API is **public**.

countryCode.description: A 2-letter country code defined in ISO-3166

_description.description: A description, can be up to 5000 characters long

_email.description: An email address in the RFC-5322 specification

_phone.description: A person's phone An E.164 formatted phone number

_locale.description: A person's locale Locale in the following format: {language-ISO639}-{countryCode-ISO3166} lowercase.

_dateOfBirth.description: A person's date of birth A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format

_username.description: User's username. Can be an email or a regular username. With this username you login to the system.

_deviceRegistrationCode.description: The registration code entity that is attached to the device

BasicEntityData.description: If count is 1 - holds the information about the single referencer

templateId.description: The id of a template that is configured in the settings service.

parentEntityId.description: The id of the parent entity (appears only for child entities)

templateName.description: The name of the referenced entity template

name.description: The caption of the referenced entity

displayName.description: The display name of the template

_connected.description: If the device is connected to the MQTT the value is true, otherwise false

_ipAddress.description: The IP Address of the connected device

_lastConnectedTime.description: The last time that the device was connected

_timezone.description: A java time zone supported by the java runtime environment

_referencers.description: An object that contains all the referencers of this entity. Each referencer is the RSAN and it's an object that contains the count of the referrers, and information of the referrer (in case count = 1)

additionalProperties.description: An object that holds the entity configuration attributes

_configuration.description: An object that holds the entity configuration attributes

_creationTime.description: A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format

_lastModifiedTime.description: A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format

_caption.description: The caption of the command instance

_bootTime.description: A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format

ParentTemplateResponse.description: Base information about the template parent

_description.description: A description, can be up to 5000 characters long

_email.description: An email address in the RFC-5322 specification

_phone.description: A person's phone An E.164 formatted phone number

_locale.description: A person's locale Locale in the following format: {language-ISO639}-{countryCode-ISO3166} lowercase.

_dateOfBirth.description: A person's date of birth A UTC date in the ISO-8601 format

_creationTime.description: A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format

_lastModifiedTime.description: A UTC date-time in the ISO-8601 format

_referencers.description: An object that contains all the referencers of this entity. Each referencer is the RSAN and it's an object that contains the count of the referrers, and information of the referrer (in case count = 1)

_username.description: User's username. Can be an email or a regular username. With this username you login to the system.

_registrationSource.description: The source of the registration. Possible values: INVITATION / SELF

_canLogin.description: Determine whether a patient has the ability to login to the system or not

_nickname.description: The patient nickname. Used for anonymous users.

name.description: The reference side attribute name from the attribute reference configuration

displayName.description: The reference side attribute display name from the attribute reference configuration

count.description: Total count of all the referencers from this specific template and attribute

ReferencedSideAttributeInformation.description: An object that contains all the referencers of this entity. Each referencer is the RSAN and it's an object that contains the count of the referrers, and information of the referrer (in case count = 1)

_username.description: User's username. Can be an email or a regular username. With this username you login to the system.

_deviceRegistrationCode.description: The registration code entity that is attached to the device

deviceRegistrationCode.description: The registration code entity that is attached to the device
